info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 6:28PM EDT until August 29 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SANILAC AND EASTERN HURON COUNTIES... At 627 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kinde to 7 miles southwest of Harbor Beach to near Carsonville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Forestville around 635 PM EDT. Harbor Beach and Port Sanilac around 640 PM EDT. Port Hope around 650 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Redman, Parisville, Huron City, McGregor, White Rock, Rapson, Grindstone City, Ruth, Tyre and Port Crescent State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
